description:
Need a new chain for your commuter bike on the rainy West coast? On your cross bike before a mucky season? Or your MTB in the winter wet? This 10-speed chain is treated with KMC’s EPT finish that doubles the rust resistance, so you can head out into wet weather with confidence.

  • Compatible with SRAM, Shimano and Campagnolo 10-speed drivetrains
  • Includes a reusable KMC Missing Link 10 for easy installation and removal
  • EcoProTeq (EPT) treatment doubles the rust resistance compared to KMC's RustBuster (RB) treatment
  • Width: 5.88mm
  • Non-directional
name: KMC X10 EPT 10 Speed Chain
